entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Get "Fatal error. System.AccessViolationException: Attempted to read or write protected memory. This is often an indication that other memory is corrupt." in Blazor app with hot reload in .Net 7 #32084
  • Enum to numeric type implicit conversion #32083
  • I have problem with outputting .apk in MAUI #32064
  • Error while running dotnet build in a new test project #32061
  • System.Text.Json Serialize wrong result #32053

Closed

  • [SBRP] error CS0246 errors is generated TypeForwardAttributes #31250
    .NET 8.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Enable TestBaseTypeWithAmbiguousNonDefaultConstructorsRegression31655 #32091
    untriaged, Area-GenAPI
  • Switch format owner #32090
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove msbuild properties that pointed to old versions #32089
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • support correct property name and ensure compat with old name #32085
    Area-Containers
  • add more knobs to control upload chunk size, and if parallel upload s… #32080
    Area-Containers
  • Add Nuget vulnerabilities output #32072
    Servicing-consider, Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix the NETSDK1094 errors #32058
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #32009
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [main] Add Nuget vulnerabilities output #32002
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Workaround malformed `typeof` statements in TypeForwardedToAttributes #32014
    untriaged, Area-GenAPI
  • Updating the minimum VS version #31720
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • [Breaking] `RuntimeIdentifier` No Longer Implies `SelfContained` Apps by Default #30038
    Area-Infrastructure, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Follow-up to #31559 #32047
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Reference ILLink analyzer matching ILLink version #32045
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • Update dependabot to run on 4xx #31837
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/7.0.4xx] include container tasks and targets directly to `Microsoft.NET.Publish.Sdk` #31432
    Area-Containers
  • updated containers docs #31884
    Area-Containers
  • Add a PostAction to support modifying Json files in CLI templates #29880
    Area-dotnet new
  • Bump FakeItEasy from 7.3.1 to 7.4.0 in /eng/dependabot #31987
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies, dependabot: main
